subject: [cc-community] CC Citizen News Channel -- GroundReport TV
body:
Hi all,

Wanted to let you know about the upcoming launch of GroundReport TV, a 
live streaming citizen journalism news channel. Right now we are 
accepting content submissions and reporter applications at: 
http://groundreport.com/participate.php

All content is Creative Commons licensed, and the channel is online and 
streaming 24/7. If you're not into video, users can also self-publish 
text and photo reports instantly at GroundReport.com. Feel free to get 
in touch with any questions.

Thanks,
Rachel

Founder, GroundReport.com
http://groundreport.com
rachel@groundreport.com
_______________________________________________
